turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, can you order me that coffee drink I always get from Starbucks? I forget what it's called.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing, did you want the Iced Latte or the Cold Brew?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's go with the Iced Latte, wanting some flavor today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, did you want the 3 or 4 shots of espresso?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Go with 4, I need the extra shot today. What kind of sugar-free syrups do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They've got caramel, vanilla, and cinnamon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's go with caramel.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and you want the grande or venti?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti please. Can you order it from the Starbucks on Clinton Avenue, they have the pick up counter.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can, your info is saved and you have a free drink because of the stars program.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome, anyway you can add a tip now? $1 if possible.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No I can't, if you don't have cash just say you'll tip next time, they should probably do something about that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For sure. It's not fair at all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any sandwiches or cookies or anything?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks, just the coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay cool, what kind of creamer do you want? You usually get the almond milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have skim there too?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They do, skim, whole, fat-free, and almond milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's go almond milk actually.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing, so I've got the venti iced latte with an extra shot of espresso and sugar free caramel and almond milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, I'll be there in five minutes so go ahead and send the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will do, the coffee has been ordered and it'll be ready in a few minutes at the pick up counter.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!
